page.title: 16DAILY ROUTINE BY MICHAEL
page.content: At 6.45 my Radio alarm goes off and I listen to Adrian John on Radio 1. At 7.00 my Mum comes in with a cup of tea. I drink it then have my shower. I start off with the water cold then gradually turn up the heat. Then I get dressed and go downstairs for my Breakfast. I have Weetabix with brown sugar and milk and Orange juice. While I eat I watch 'Popeye' on T.V.A.M. After that I comb my hair, brush my teeth and get ready for school. When I get home after school I change out of school uniform and watch T.V or play with my Computer. After that I take the dog for a walk and play with her in the Park. I then go home and have my tea. Then I listen to my Radio or Read till Bedtime.
